title: Seduction.com
description: The Queen of Seduction, Erika, is back and in charge. No longer a temptress at Passionate Playmates, but as the owner of an adult website, Fantasy Girls. After a nightmare of events causing Passionate Playmates to shut down, she sets out determined to make Fantasy Girls into a million dollar brand. Using her business degree and good looks,Erika's website quickly becomes one of the top in the industry. With her website doing well, she sets her sights on building an elite martini bar, with a little something extra for the men. Erika soon finds out that being the boss may not be all that is cracked up to be. Will Erika be able to survive the adult industry while balancing her sexual exploits, devious employees, and someone from her past bent on destroying her?
author: Keeys Omegia
